column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hama says : " Growing up in the South Pole , waterbenders are totally at home surrounded by snow and ice and seas .
#Text=When we were stranded in the desert , I felt like there was almost nothing I could do .
#Text=" Hama says : " That 's why you have to learn to control water wherever it exists .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 've even used my own sweat for waterbending .
#Text=" Hama says : " That 's very resourceful , Katara .
#Text=You 're thinking like a true master .
#Text=But did you know you could even pull water out of thin air ?
#Text=" Hama says : " You have got to keep an open mind , Katara .
#Text=There 's water in places you never think about .
#Text=" Aang says : " This has got to be the nicest natural setting in the Fire Nation .
#Text=I do n't see anything that would make a spirit mad around here .
#Text=" Toph says : " Maybe the Moon Spirit just turned mean .
#Text=" Sokka says : " The Moon Spirit is a gentle , loving lady .
#Text=She rules the sky with compassion and ... lunar goodness !
#Text=" Aang says : " Excuse me , sir .
#Text=Can you tell us anything about the spirit that 's been stealing people ?
#Text=" Villager says : " Only one man ever saw it and lived and that 's Old Man Ding .
#Text=" Toph says : " Where does Old Man Ding live ?
#Text="
